description:
90 Ability Power
15 Magic Penetration
4% Move Speed

Stormraider
Dealing 25% of a champion's maximum Health within 2.5s applies Squall to them and grants 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.

Squall
After 2 seconds, deal magic damage. If the target dies before Squall triggers, it damages nearby enemies and you gain 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.
name: Stormsurge
